spawning.comment: Allows the general spawning of pebbles.

stone_pebbles.comment: Allows the spawning of stone pebbles.

andesite_pebbles.comment: Allows the spawning of andesite pebbles.

diorite_pebbles.comment: Allows the spawning of diorite pebbles.

granite_pebbles.comment: Allows the spawning of granite pebbles.

basalt_pebbles.comment: Allows the spawning of basalt pebbles.

blackstone_pebbles.comment: Allows the spawning of blackstone pebbles.
